addToDatabase

Adds the customer to the database.

customerIsUnike

private boolean customerIsUnike(java.lang.String phone)
Checks that the customer does not already exist in the database. A phone number can only have one customer.

Parameters:
phone - The phone number of a customer.
Returns:
boolean True if the customer is unike, and false else.

getCustomerFromOrder

public static Customer getCustomerFromOrder(int idCustomer)
Takes a id of an customer and looks up in the database and check if the customer exist. The customer will be returned with all the info from the database.

getRelevantCustomers

public static java.util.ArrayList<Customer> getRelevantCustomers(java.lang.String query)
Takes a query in as a String and asks the database for relevant customers to the query. The query will be matched on first name, last name and phone number.

Parameters:
query -
Returns:
ArrayList with the customers.
